column1: tlohella pompong ya tsenethu wena neuoe
neuoe chechella kwana robala hantle neuoe
ha rebapale mantlwane kenekere tloo nke moriana ngwana waka
hwane kenekere pompong ntho ena emonate mme
neuoe utlareka diapole le dinamune le dikaneye
hei wena neuoe tlohela ngwana enwa
tsenetu ebe obatlang ha ale lerata tje
